applicant-name.name: SHANGHAI PUJIANG SPECIALTY GASES CO LTD
上海浦江特种气体有限公司

invention-title: Method and system for preparing hydrogen and capturing carbon dioxide based on wet garbage biogas
基于湿垃圾沼气制取氢气并捕捉二氧化碳的方法和系统

abstract.p: The invention relates to the technical field of hydrogen production, in particular to a method and system for producing hydrogen and capturing carbon dioxide based on wet garbage biogas. The invention provides a system for preparing hydrogen and capturing carbon dioxide based on wet garbage biogas. The system mainly comprises a hydrogen production device and a carbon dioxide liquefaction device. The hydrogen production device takes biogas as a raw material, and adopts a process route of biogas wet-process MDEA decarburization, steam conversion, synthesis gas wet-process MDEA decarburization and PSA separation to obtain the product hydrogen. The carbon dioxide liquefying device is used for preparing an industrial liquid carbon dioxide by-product through the processes of gas compression, purification, low-temperature liquefaction, rectification and purification and the like by taking regenerated gas removed in the rich liquid regeneration process of a biogas wet decarbonization system and a medium-temperature shift gas wet decarbonization system in the hydrogen production device as a raw material. Compared with the prior art, the overall energy conversion efficiency of the biogas hydrogen production technology can reach 64%, and the energy efficiency is more than one time higher than that of biogas power generation.

本发明涉及制氢技术领域，尤其是涉及一种基于湿垃圾沼气制取氢气并捕捉二氧化碳的方法和系统。本发明提供的基于湿垃圾沼气制取氢气并捕捉二氧化碳的系统主要由制氢装置和二氧化碳液化装置组成。制氢装置以沼气为原料，采用的工艺路线为沼气湿法MDEA脱碳→蒸汽转化→合成气湿法MDEA脱碳→PSA分离得到产品氢气。二氧化碳液化装置以制氢装置中沼气湿法脱碳系统和中变气湿法脱碳系统富液再生过程脱出的再生气为原料，经气体压缩、净化、低温液化、精馏提纯等过程制得工业液体二氧化碳副产品。与现有技术相比，本发明采用沼气制氢技术的总体能量转换效率可以达到64％，比沼气发电能效高出一倍以上。
